alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 11:57AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JO DAVIESS COUNTY... At 1157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Council Hill, or near Galena, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Council Hill and Guilford around 1200 PM CDT. Scales Mound around 1205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Apple Canyon Lake and Apple River. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
